C

connecdim - Class in tridonic.connecdim.webapi
The main class to securely access the connecdim cloud with your account at https://api.connecdim.com/
connecdim() - Constructor for class tridonic.connecdim.webapi.connecdim
Creates a blank connecdim without username or password information
connecdim(String, String) - Constructor for class tridonic.connecdim.webapi.connecdim
Constructs the class using the username and password supplied for authentication
connecdimAddress - Class in tridonic.connecdim.webapi
DALI device with a DALI Address usually created with connecdimLine.getAddress( number )
connecdimAddress(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class tridonic.connecdim.webapi.connecdimAddress
Constructor
connecdimGateway - Class in tridonic.connecdim.webapi
DALI gateway that is installed into a site usually created with connecdim.getGateways( macaddress ) or connecdimLine.getGateways().get(x)
connecdimGateway(String, String, String) - Constructor for class tridonic.connecdim.webapi.connecdimGateway
Constructs gateway with the macaddress specified using the username and password for the connecdim cloud
connecdimGroup - Class in tridonic.connecdim.webapi
DALI group that is associated to a connecdim Line.
connecdimGroup(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class tridonic.connecdim.webapi.connecdimGroup
Constructor used with the group and lineId associated with the cloud
connecdimLine - Class in tridonic.connecdim.webapi
DALI line that is associated to a connecdim gateway.
connecdimLine(String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class tridonic.connecdim.webapi.connecdimLine
DALI line that is associated to a connecdim gateway.
connecdimScene - Class in tridonic.connecdim.webapi
DALI scene that is associated to a connecdim Line.
connecdimScene(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class tridonic.connecdim.webapi.connecdimScene
DALI scene that is associated to a connecdim line.
connecdimSite - Class in tridonic.connecdim.webapi
DALI site which is the physical location of the building that is associated with the connecdim cloud.
